segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are thinking of a two days ' tour to Vienna .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good place to go at this time . How about this route ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks fine . Is this an inclusive tour ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir , you have to deal with your own meal since we charge you only $ 80 for the trip .
segments.speaker: S1
